verses.verse: He brought me <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H4325>behold,<s%> waters issued <S%H3318>out<s%> from under the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6921>eastward;<s%> (for the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> was toward the <S%H6921>east;<s%>) and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H3233>under,<s%> from the right <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then he brought me <S%H3318>out<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and led me round by the <S%H1870>way<s%> outside to the <S%H2351>outer<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and <S%H6379>behold,<s%> there ran out <S%H4325>waters<s%> on the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side.<s%>

When the <S%H376>man<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%> with the <S%H6957>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and he caused me to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were to the <S%H657>ankles.<s%>

Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> one <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and caused me to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were to the <S%H1290>knees.<s%> Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> one <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and caused me to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> waters that were to the <S%H4975>waist.<s%>

Afterward he <S%H4058>measured<s%> one <S%H505>thousand;<s%> and it was a <S%H5158>river<s%> that I <S%H3201>could<s%> not pass <S%H5674>through;<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H1342>risen,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> to swim <S%H7813>in,<s%> a <S%H5158>river<s%> that could not be passed <S%H5674>through.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3212>this?<s%> Then he brought <S%H7725>me,<s%> and caused me to return to the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river.<s%>
Now when I had <S%H7725>returned,<s%> <S%H8193>behold,<s%> on the bank of the <S%H5158>river<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> trees on the one side and on the <S%H6086>other.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4325>me,<s%> These waters issue <S%H3318>forth<s%> toward the <S%H6930>eastern<s%> <S%H1552>region,<s%> and shall <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H6160>Arabah;<s%> and they shall go toward the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall the waters go which were made to issue <S%H3318>forth;<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

It shall <S%H5315>happen,<s%> that every living creature which <S%H2416>swarms,<s%> in every <S%H8317>place<s%> where the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> multitude of <S%H1710>fish;<s%> for these <S%H4325>waters<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7495>there,<s%> and the waters of the sea shall be healed, and everything shall <S%H2425>live<s%> wherever the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>

It shall <S%H1728>happen,<s%> that fishermen shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> by <S%H5872>it:<s%> from En Gedi even to En <S%H5882>Eglaim<s%> shall be a place for the <S%H4894>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets;<s%> their <S%H1710>fish<s%> shall be after their <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> as the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>
But the miry <S%H1207>places<s%> of <S%H1360>it,<s%> and its marshes, shall not be <S%H7495>healed;<s%> they shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> up to <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

By the <S%H5158>river<s%> on its <S%H8193>bank,<s%> on this side and on that <S%H5927>side,<s%> shall grow every <S%H6086>tree<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall not <S%H5034>wither,<s%> neither shall its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H8552>fail:<s%> it shall bring forth new <S%H1069>fruit<s%> every <S%H2320>month,<s%> because its <S%H4325>waters<s%> issue <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> and its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall be for <S%H3978>food,<s%> and its <S%H5929>leaf<s%> for <S%H8644>healing.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1454>This<s%> shall be the <S%H1366>border,<s%> by which you shall divide the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall have two <S%H2256>portions.<s%>

You shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H376>it,<s%> one as well as <S%H251>another;<s%> for <S%H5375>I<s%> <S%H3027>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to your <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and this <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to you for <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

This shall be the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> On the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> from the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon,<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H6657>Zedad;<s%>

<S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> <S%H1268>Berothah,<s%> <S%H5453>Sibraim,<s%> which is between the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath;<s%> Hazer <S%H2694>Hatticon,<s%> which is by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2362>Hauran.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> shall be Hazar <S%H2703>Enon<s%> at the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus;<s%> and on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%> This is the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

The <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2362>Hauran<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall be the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> <S%H996>from<s%> the north <S%H1366>border<s%> to the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> you shall <S%H4058>measure.<s%> This is the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

The <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%> shall be from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> as far as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>Meriboth<s%> <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H1419>Egypt,<s%> to the great <S%H3220>sea.<s%> This is the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H5045>southward.<s%>

The <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> shall be the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> from the south <S%H1366>border<s%> as far <S%H935>as<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the entrance of <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%> This is the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>
So you shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> to you according to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It shall <S%H5307>happen,<s%> that you shall divide it by lot for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to you and to the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> who <S%H1481>live<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3205>you,<s%> who shall father <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H249>you;<s%> and they shall be to you as the native - <S%H249>born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> they shall <S%H5307>have<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It shall <S%H7626>happen,<s%> that in what tribe the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>lives,<s%> there you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
